name: Pizzly
description: A Node Application to simplify OAuth

scripts.postdeploy: npm run db:create --env=production && npm run db:migrate --env=production

DASHBOARD_USER.description: The username to protect access to your Pizzly's dashboard.

DASHBOARD_PASSWORD.description: The password to protect access to your Pizzly's dashboard.

SECRET_KEY.description: An unguessable string used to authenticate server-to-server requests.

PUBLISHABLE_KEY.description: An unguessable string used to authenticate frontend-to-server requests.

COOKIE_SECRET.description: An unguessable string to sign and verify cookie session.

PROXY_USES_SECRET_KEY_ONLY.description: Advanced - Restrict access to the proxy service with a secret key only.

AUTH_CALLBACK_URL.description: Advanced - Force which authentication URL to use.
